EmailTemplate.name: 02_25_2014 MSFT-VMM Launch.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Diversify Safely with Hyper-V
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
VMTurbo Enables Safe VMware-to-Hyper-V Diversification {{lead.First Name:default=Are You}}:
Diversifying with Hyper-V (http://bit.ly/1fDv7d5)? The functional and economic benefits of Microsoft's ready-for-prime time hypervisor - as well as the growth of its surrounding ecosystem - have enticed many enterprises to consider the switch from vSphere.
Join us on March 19th for the premier of VirtualizationSoftware.com's Readiness Series featuring Scott Lowe and David Davis (http://bit.ly/1kbI1zj). You'll explore Hyper-V's exciting growth, the imperative of virtual diversification, and how VMTurbo drives this essential diversity.
Hyper-V has arrived. Diversify safely, from V to shining V.
In good health, VMTurbo
